alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 11:04PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: .An ice jam has formed on the Yukon River at Circle and major flooding is now occuring. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...Yukon River at Circle. * WHEN...Until 630 PM AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Near record flooding is now occurring at Circle. Many structures are flooding. Large blocks of ice could push onshore damaging structures near the river bank. Water has risen very rapidly and will remain high until the ice jam releases. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1104 PM AKDT, A 90 mile long run of ice and high water on the Yukon River has now jammed at Circle. A caller from Circle after 8pm this evening reported that major flooding was occuring. - Water has risen very rapidly at Circle and is now causing major flooding. Water could rise further tonight and Sunday. Ice could push onshore damaging structures near the river bank. People should take action now to move to higher ground. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Circle. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood - If you live near or along the Yukon River near Circle move to higher ground if you can safely do so. If water and ice is surrounding your home, move to the highest level you can safely get to in your home.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
